frame.name: Willingness
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> would engage in an <fen>Activity</fen> if asked or otherwise prompted to do so.
<ex><fex name="Cognizer">The court</fex> <m>is</m> <t>willing</t> <fex name="Activity">to depart from the usual range of sentencing</fex> .</ex>
<ex><fex name="Cognizer">The Nicaraguan National Assembly</fex> has <m>been</m> <t>reluctant</t> <fex name="Activity">to destroy the remaining stockpile</fex>. </ex>
<ex>The Turks are in <t>grudging</t> <fex name="act">acceptance</fex> of terms set by EU.</ex>
<ex>Would <fex name="Cognizer">you</fex> <m>be</m> <t>prepared</t><fex name="Activity">to give up some of your privacy to industry to help improve customer service</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the individual that is willing to engage in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Cog">My mom</fex> <m>is</m> very <t>loath</t> to take any drugs without medical supervision.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition:
<def-root> The <fen>Activity</fen> is what the <fen>Cognizer</fen> would do under certain circumstances.
<ex>Does biology really matter more than a <t>willingness</t> <fex name="act">to take an active role in a child's life</fex>? </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s willingness logically follows.
<ex>The other companies would have been <t>unwilling</t> to participate <fex name="exp">because of the project's high risk</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the<fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is willing to engage in the <fen>Activity</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is willing to engage in the <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of affairs that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> wants to achieve by being willing to engage in the <fen>Activity</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the willingness from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
<ex>If you need help or have any problems, she is <fex name="deg">extremely</fex> <t>willing</t> to work with you.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes the number of times the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is willing per some unit of time.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: willingness.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the state or degree of being unopposed to

lexUnit.name: unwillingness.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the state or degree of being opposed to

lexUnit.name: prepared.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: willing (as a result of consideration)
